channel.title: Chase the Fox Website Updates
channel.description: Up-to-date additions and changes to Chase the Fox's website!

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Ratatosk
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Monster species, Ratatosk.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Terraboldt
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Monster species, Terraboldt.

item.title: New Character: Champ
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Champ, the time-lost husky.

item.title: New Character: Wally Cognisarian
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Wally Cognisarian, the scheming weasel.

item.title: New Character: Pyrrhe Drake
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Pyrrhe Drake, the greatest hero in Casarok's history.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Garuda
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Aspect species, Garuda.

item.title: New Magic Class Entry: Injuja
item.description: Added a new page to Magic Classes in the World section for the users of a dancing martial art, Injujas.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Sporacyst
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Floradon species, Sporacyst.

item.title: New Character: Jay Buchholz
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Jay "Buck" Buchholz, the pilot.

item.title: New Character: Cameron Leone
item.description: Added a new page to the Character section for Cameron Leone, the artist extraordinaire.

item.title: New Bestiary Entry: Talis
item.description: Added a new page to the Bestiary in the World section for the Anthro species, Talis.

item.title: Commission Information
item.description: Added a new page detailing commission pricing and information.
